Reference

Tutorials

Generate tutorial PDF or HTML files.

tutorial_html() tutorial_html_solution()

Convert to a tutorial HTML document

tutorial_pdf() tutorial_pdf_solution()

Convert to a tutorial PDF document

Examen

PDF template to generate examen files.

examen_pdf() examen_pdf_solution()

Convert to an examen PDF document

Answer

Generate a Rmarkdown file to fill in answers

answer_rmd()

Convert to a tutorial answer Rmarkdown file
